All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvancedBuilder
This class is the concrete class extends from the WorldBuilder class.
It sets image game settings instead of geometric settings.
BallModel
This is the class of the ball, which defines the basic attributes of the ball, which includes the radius, ball's bound and the ball's position property.
It also provides methods to access and modify some attributes.
Ball's radius property is not allowed to change once it has been defined.
BallView
This is the abstract base class for all ball;s view and relates it to the movements of the ball.
Brick
This is the abstract base class for all brick classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all brick classes.
BrickFactory
Only defined constructor of the brick building is allowed.
Each constructor has its set value for brick settings.
CementBrick
This cement brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
It contains crack property.
CharacterOptions
Each constructor set have its defined value for character image and paddle image, since they are designed to bind with each other.
The player is able to set the paddle image by choosing the character
CharacterOptionsController
This class is the controller of the character option page
ClayBrick
This clay brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
Note: Its class name is clay brick, which makes its previous name "Brick2" readable.
It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.
Crack
This crack class gets and sets the crack property.
It is seperated from the original brick class.
DirectorApp
This class is the controller of the scene option page
GameApplication
This is the application of the game.
GameOverScreenController
This class is the controller of the game over page
GameStatusModel
This is the class defines the basic attributes of the game playing.
It detects the change of the game board and set the gaming basics that includes the life, remaining brick and the level.
Since it is the observer of the world, it is not allowed to be set by the user, once it has been created.
GameStatusView
This is the class for getting the information of the current game status.
GeneralBuilder
This class is the builder using geometry class to build the scene.
HighestRankController
This class is the controller of the highest rank page
ImageBallView
This image ball class is the concrete class extends from the ball class.
It creates the ball with set image.
ImagePaddleView
This image ball class is the concrete class extends from the ball class.
It creates the ball with set image.
Index
This class is the controller of the scene option page
IndexController
This class is the controller of the index start page
InstructionController
This class is the controller of the instruction page
LogIn
This class is the controller of the scene option page
LogInController
This class is the controller of the log in page
Movable
This interface contains movable behaviour.
Note: It is added for presenting object's property
PaddleModel
This is the class of the paddle model, which defines the basic attributes of the paddle, which includes paddle's position and paddle's width property.
It also provides methods to access and modify some attributes.
Paddle's width and height property is not allowed to change once it has been defined.
PaddleView
This is the abstract class for all paddle classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all paddle classes.
PauseMenuController
This class is the controller of the pause menu page
PowerUpController
This class is the controller of the power up page
Record
This class for the player's game record, which includes the name, score and created time.
RegularPaddleView
This is the concrete class extends from the paddleView class.
It creates the paddle with geometry class using color and shape.
RubberBallView
This is the concrete class extends from the ballView class.
It creates the ball view with geometry class using color and shape.
SceneFactory
This is the helper class for building the world and pre character option view for the character chosen page.
It aims at code reusing and uses the Factory Pattern.
SceneOptions
Each constructor has its set value for brickSets,background music,background image and ball image.
The enum name stands for the specific theme choice.
SceneOptionsController
This class is the controller of the scene option page
SoundEffect
The player is only allowed to hear the specific music defined in this class
SteelBrick
This steel brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
Steel brick type would break according to a generated random value.
World
This class contains the model for all the game board settings.
WorldBuilder
This class is the builder for the game setting.
It separates the scene building part from the original GameBoard class.
WorldController
This class is the controller of the game viewing and game playing status checker.
